response:
1. Review current automation processes
2. Identify potential areas for expansion
3. Prioritize identified areas based on impact and feasibility
4. Allocate budget for new automation tools if necessary
5. Train team on new or updated automation tools
6. Develop detailed implementation plan for selected projects
7. Schedule regular check-ins to track progress
8. Automate one high-impact task
9. Automate another high-impact task
10. Evaluate effectiveness of automated tasks post-implementation
11. Make adjustments based on evaluation results
12. Continue automating additional tasks as needed
13. Monitor and report progress towards 50% increase by Q4 end
